MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PR8 postcode area of Southport, affecting properties in Liverpool Road and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of  the complexity of the repair needed to our underground cable network and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12 Noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:44 AM on 18th December 2020.
